getAssertionCreationBlockForLogLookup(by.details: This function is meant for internal use only and has no stability guarantees.

returns._0: A structure with information about the requested staker
True or False for whether the staker was staked
Hash of the latest confirmed assertion
Latest assertion staked of the staker
Number of active stakers currently staked

params.owner: Address to check the funds of

returns._0: Amount of funds withdrawable by owner

amountStaked(address).notice: Get the amount staked of the given staker

getAssertion(bytes32).notice: Get the Assertion for the given id.

getAssertionCreationBlockForLogLookup(by.notice: Returns the block in which the given assertion was created for looking up its creation event. Unlike the assertion's createdAtBlock field, this will be the ArbSys blockNumber if the host chain is an Arbitrum chain. That means that the block number returned for this is usable for event queries. This function will revert if the given assertion hash does not exist.

getStaker(address).notice: Retrieves stored information about a requested staker

getStakerAddress(uint64).notice: Get the address of the staker at the given index

isStaked(address).notice: Check whether the given staker is staked

latestStakedAssertion(address).notice: Get the latest staked assertion of the given staker

withdrawableFunds(address).notice: Get the amount of funds withdrawable by the given address

withdrawalAddress(address).notice: Get the withdrawal address of the given staker
